entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:26 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -21.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 6:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -21.9°C

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 40 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -31.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
